name: Write a function that determines if a number is even or odd

text:
@para:Write some code that generates a fibonacci sequence, or something. Something that works at all. It just needs
to return anything. Something.

@para:Anything at all works. It doesn't have to be a fibonacci sequence. It could be complete garbage. Professors
ever don't check the answers, anyway
